MD6B.F.summary: MD Medical Group Investments Plc, an investment holding company, operates a chain of clinics that provide healthcare services for women and children in Russia. It offers a range of services in the areas of obstetrics and gynecology, fertility and in-vitro fertilization treatment, and pediatrics, as well as diagnostics, urology, radiology, surgery, traumatology, rehabilitation, cardiology, oncology, endovascular, laboratory testing, and others. The company also retails pharmaceutics; provides assistance and rental services; and operates as a management company, as well as holds land. As of February 1, 2021, it managed 42 healthcare facilities, including 6 hospitals and 36 out-patient clinics in Moscow Region, St. Petersburg, Ufa, Perm, Samara and the Samara Region, Irkutsk, Novosibirsk, Irkutsk, Yaroslavl, Ryazan, Kostroma, Novokuznetsk, Krasnoyarsk, Omsk, Barnaul, Vladimir, Tyumen, Voronezh, Nizhny Novgorod, Volgograd, Tula, Kazan, Vladivostok, Krasnodar, and Rostov on Don. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Nicosia, Cyprus. MD Medical Group Investments Plc is a subsidiary of MD Medical Holding Limited.
